name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven .NET Developer with over 10 years of full stack experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in using **.NET**, **C#**, **.NET Core**, and **ASP.NET Web API** to create robust applications. Extensive knowledge of **SQL Server**, **Entity Framework**, and **LINQ** for efficient data handling and architecture design. Skilled in developing **RESTful APIs** and leveraging **microservices architecture** to build scalable solutions. Hands-on experience with cloud services including **Azure**, ensuring deployment of cloud-native applications. 

Adept in front-end technologies like **Angular**, **React**, and **Blazor** to create interactive user interfaces. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD pipelines** with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to streamline development processes. Committed to Agile methodologies and proficient in frameworks such as **Scrum**, fostering collaboration and communication within cross-functional teams.

My strong problem-solving skills, combined with a foundational understanding of MLOps and modern software practices, empower me to develop innovative solutions that drive significant impact across healthcare and finance sectors.
